message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the deal, but I'm hoping to get it for a bit less.  Would you be willing to accept $85?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $87.50 for the product. It's the best I can do for now.
